product.title: Cinderella III: A Twist in Time | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Cinderella III: A Twist in Time

Cinderella couldn't be happier and her stepsisters and their wicked mother couldn't be more miserable. Cinderella and the prince are living happily ever after in the palace. The princess’ awful stepmother and stepsisters, Anastasia and Drizella, are angry and jealous. One day Anastasia learns Cinderella's secret—magic. After getting their hands on the Fairy Godmother's magic wand, the wicked stepmother and her daughters try to turn back time...but with a little Bibbidi-bobidi-boo, love conquers all—again.

Tie-in Activity: Bibbidi-bobidi-boo, have your child use her imagination to come up with her own magic words, then help your child create a magic wand of her very own. Cut out a star on a piece of construction or poster paper. Have your child decorate the star with glitter or crayons. Glue the star to a straw, and let the magic begin.
